What Anand is saying is that the client tests were done on Win2k and the
se=
rver tests on a unix box.

I suggest using the text runner always as it's m=
uch faster than the
swingui (at startup) and there are no classloader probl=
ems.  Try using
VNC if you want to run swing in X11 and haven't got a windo=
ws X client.
It's pretty good.
